channel.title: economy on Orange
channel.description: Recent content in economy on Orange

item.title: Socio-economic data at your fingertips
item.description: A new add-on has joined the Orange family! It is called World Happiness and it is intended for retrieving socio-econimic data from global databases. Go to Options –> Add-ons and select World Happiness from the list to install it. Currently, it contains a single wigdet - Socioeconomic Indices. But fret not! This one widget can do many things. Say I wish to retrieve data for Europe and Central Asia, which I can select from the Countries list.
